div.p: S.M. and E.G. designed the research; P.S. developed the model, carried out the experiments and produced the data and most figures with support from co-authors; H.F. developed the spatial representations of ski areas, contributed to produce the data and produced Figure 1; D.V. and M.D. provided the method for the adjustment of the regional climate projections and D.V. produced the adjusted climate projections; M.L. assisted in the development of the model and method for climate data adjustment; N.E. contributed to the statistical analysis; all authors contributed to the analysis and interpretation of the results; P.S., S.M. and H.F. wrote the paper, using input and feedback from all co-authors.
